languages.text: {n}Маражай цокает языком.{/n} "Какая разочаровывающая узость сознания. Или же это трусость, {name}? Впрочем, то твой изъян, а не мой". {n}Он перешагивает через борт рейдера, возвращаясь обратно на террассу.{/n}

{n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай цокает языком.{/n} "Какая разочаровывающая узость сознания. Или же это трусость, {name}? Впрочем, то твой изъян, а не мой". {n}Он перешагивает через борт рейдера, возвращаясь обратно на террассу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌。{/n}“如此鼠目寸光，真是令人失望。还是说，其实是因为你太懦弱了吗，{name}？反正这是你的弱点，不是我的。”{n}他跨过掠袭者战机的侧翼，回到了平台上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌。{/n}“如此鼠目寸光，真是令人失望。还是说，其实是因为你太懦弱了吗，{name}？反正这是你的弱点，不是我的。”{n}他跨过掠袭者战机的侧翼，回到了平台上。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが舌打ちをする。{/n}「器が小せぇな。残念だ。それとも怖気付いたか、{name}？だが、それはお前の弱さで、俺のものじゃない」{n}彼はレイダーの片側をまたいでデッキに戻った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが舌打ちをする。{/n}「器が小せぇな。残念だ。それとも怖気付いたか、{name}？だが、それはお前の弱さで、俺のものじゃない」{n}彼はレイダーの片側をまたいでデッキに戻った。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua.{/n} «Qué mentalidad tan cerrada. Me decepcionas. ¿O acaso es cobardía, {name}? Pero esa es tu debilidad, no la mía». {n}El drukhari salta por la borda del incursor y regresa a la plataforma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua.{/n} «Qué mentalidad tan cerrada. Me decepcionas. ¿O acaso es cobardía, {name}? Pero esa es tu debilidad, no la mía». {n}El drukhari salta por la borda del incursor y regresa a la plataforma.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « Ce que vous pouvez avoir l'esprit étriqué... C'est très décevant. Mais peut-être est-ce votre lâcheté qui parle, {name} ? Quoi qu'il en soit, je ne partage pas votre faiblesse. » {n}Il enjambe la carlingue du croiseur et regagne la plateforme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « Ce que vous pouvez avoir l'esprit étriqué... C'est très décevant. Mais peut-être est-ce votre lâcheté qui parle, {name} ? Quoi qu'il en soit, je ne partage pas votre faiblesse. » {n}Il enjambe la carlingue du croiseur et regagne la plateforme.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge.{/n} "Sehr engstirniges Denken. So enttäuschend. Oder ist es vielleicht Feigheit, {name}? Aber das ist Eure Schwäche, nicht meine." {n}Er steigt über den Räuber und kehrt zur Plattform zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge.{/n} "Sehr engstirniges Denken. So enttäuschend. Oder ist es vielleicht Feigheit, {name}? Aber das ist Eure Schwäche, nicht meine." {n}Er steigt über den Räuber und kehrt zur Plattform zurück.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Böylesine dar görüşlü bir zihin... Ne kadar da hayal kırıcı. Belki de korkaklıktır, ne dersin {name}? Gerçi bu senin zayıflığın, benim değil." {n}Baskıncıdan platforma dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a narrow mind. How disappointing. Or perhaps it is cowardice, {name}? But that is your weakness, not mine." {n}He steps over the side of the raider, returning to the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Böylesine dar görüşlü bir zihin... Ne kadar da hayal kırıcı. Belki de korkaklıktır, ne dersin {name}? Gerçi bu senin zayıflığın, benim değil." {n}Baskıncının üzerinden geçip platforma geri dönüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
